actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To authorize the establishment of a program of voluntary separation incentive payments for nonjudicial employees of the District of Columbia courts and employees of the District of Columbia Public Defender Service.
short_title: District of Columbia Courts and Public Defender Service Voluntary Separation Incentive Payments Act

titles.title: District of Columbia Courts and Public Defender Service Voluntary Separation Incentive Payments Act

To authorize the establishment of a program of voluntary separation incentive payments for nonjudicial employees of the District of Columbia courts and employees of the District of Columbia Public Defender Service.
